name: donc-pdf-server
description: PDF generator for Declaration of Decontamination (DONC)

scripts.install-admin: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); if (fs.existsSync('admin-app')) { execSync('cd admin-app && npm install', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('admin-app missing, skipping install'); }"
scripts.build-admin: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); if (fs.existsSync('admin-app')) { execSync('cd admin-app && npm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('admin-app missing, skipping build'); }"
scripts.build: npm run install-admin && npm run build-admin && npm install
scripts.docs: node -e "const yaml = require('js-yaml'); const fs = require('fs'); const doc = yaml.load(fs.readFileSync('./openapi/pdf-server.openapi.yaml', 'utf8')); console.log(JSON.stringify(doc, null, 2))"
